ARABIC: إِنَّمَا سُلْطَٰنُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَوَلَّوْنَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِهِۦ مُشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He only has authority over those who take him as a friend and associate others with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His power is only over those who take him as their patron, and those who ascribe equals (to God).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He has power only over those who take him as their patron and who, under his influence, associate others with Allah in His Divinity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The only authority which he has is over his friends and those who consider things equal to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Satan’s power is only over those who make friendship with him and ascribe him as a partner (in worship).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: His power is only over those who obey and follow him (Shaytan), and those who join partners with Him (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: His authority is only over those who befriend him and those who associate others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: his authority is over those who take him for their friend and ascribe associates to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: His power is only over those who make a friend of him, and those who ascribe partners unto Him (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he has power only over those who are willing to follow him and associate others with God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: His authority is only over those who befriend him and those who are in respect of Him associators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: His authority is only over those who befriend him and those who make him a partner [of Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: His authority is over those only, who take him as patron and who join partners with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: His power is only over those who obey and follow him (Satan), and those who join partners with Him (Allah) [i.e. those who are Mushrikun - polytheists - see Verse 6:121].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He has authority over those who are guided by him, and those who ascribe associates to Him (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: His authority is only over those who follow him, and those who associate others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:100] His [Satan’s] power is only over those who choose him as [their] patron, by obeying him, and those who ascribe partners to Him, that is, to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (His power) way and overpowering (is only over those who make a friend of him) those who obey him, (and those who ascribe partners unto Him (Allah)).
